---
title: "Evictions report"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("knitr")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
source("analysis.R")
```


This report will give you the data of evictions in SF.
The dataset contained `r num_evicitions` of eviction notices 

## Zip code analysis
Here is a table of the 10 zip codes with the highest number of evictions

```{r}
kable(by_zip, col.names = c("Zip Code", "Number of Evictions"))
```

## Time Series Analysis
We observed important spikes in eviction notices over time.

```{r}
month_plot
```

##Geographic analysis
Here is the spatial distribution of eviction 
```{r, warning = F}
evictions_plot
```
